alert.note: Alert for Mitchell; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 03 at 6:58PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Georgia and southwest Georgia, including the following counties, in south central Georgia, Thomas. In southwest Georgia, Mitchell. * WHEN...Until 900 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 657 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Thomasville, Pelham, Camilla, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pasco, Dawesville, Dillon, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Merrillville, Newark, Quality, Eason, Metcalf, Cotton, Everett and Mitchell Co A/P. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
